item.title: Making it on their own: Barbican Centre’s celebration of young talent
item.description: In conjunction with their retrospective on the American artists Jean-Michel Basquiat – Boom for Real – last Saturday The Barbican held Too Young for What: a celebration of Basquiat’s legacy and the youth working in London today. In the cavernous halls of the Barbican Centre, zine makers, short film …
